Regulation Name(s): Fibrinogen and Fibrin Split Products, Antigen, Antiserum, Control
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for HemosIL D-Dimer HS, a latex enhanced immunoassay for quantitative determination of D-Dimer in citrated plasma on the ACL TOP instrument.
Indications for Use Summary: Automated latex enhanced immunoassay for quantitative determination of D-Dimer in human citrated plasma on the ACL TOP as an aid in the diagnosis of venous thromboembolism (deep venous thrombosis and pulmonary embolism).
